MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL53 postcode area of Abersoch, affecting properties in Sarn Bach Road and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1.05PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating reports of 3rd party damage to our network.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.15PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.13PM on 15th October 2020.
